name: Scope
description: Standard optical scope that improves accuracy at medium to long ranges.

name: Electro-optical Scope
description: Advanced scope with IR capabilities for night operations.

name: Laser Sight
description: Projects a laser dot on target for improved aim, especially in low-light conditions.

name: Extended Magazine
description: Increases ammunition capacity at the cost of slightly increased weight.

name: Recoil Compensator
description: Reduces felt recoil, improving accuracy during rapid firing.

name: Suppressor
description: Significantly reduces the sound signature of the weapon.

name: Barrel Extension
description: Extends barrel length for improved range and accuracy at the cost of concealability.

name: Plasma Resonator
description: Enhances plasma weapon damage output at the cost of increased energy consumption.

name: Rail Accelerator
description: Increases rail weapon velocity for improved damage and armor penetration.

name: Tactical Grip
description: Ergonomic grip that improves weapon handling and draw speed.
